error.no-anchor-aim-property: Anchor or aim property property does not exist

info.part-1: Set an anchor (<anchorIcon/>) that the camera attaches to, and an aim (<aimIcon/>) for the camera to look at. The aim will be kept in the same position as time changes.
info.part-2: When selecting the aim/anchor, the chosen node will be targetted to be centered in the view. Hold <keybind>Shift</keybind> on-click to set anchor/aim without targetting.

info.click-focus-button: Click the <focusIcon /> button to focus/retarget object.
info.shift-keybind: Hold <keybind>Shift</keybind> when clicking to set as focus/anchor without retargetting.
info.ctrl-keybind: Hold <keybind>Ctrl</keybind> when clicking to keep current camera velocities.

navigation-settings.title: Navigation Settings
navigation-settings.include-non-focusable-description: Per default, nodes that are marked as non-focusable from the search in the navigation menu. Checking this option will include them and allowing setting these nodes as focus.
